author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
Hi All, 

I have created a new caloparam file, where we changed the ECAL layer1 calibrations using the tower et definition for the binning, instead of photon pt which was used earlier. Also, using tower et is the right thing to do. 

Regards
Bhawna
title: Added new CaloParams using ECAL layer1 calibrations, using tower et b
